p: Medium molecular weight chitosan (Sigma-Aldrich, CAS: 9012-76-4); deacetylation degree 75–85%) was used for the synthesis of nanoparticles. Glycerol was bought to J.T.Baker®. The ethanolic extract of propolis 30% was obtained from Remedios Herbolarios Rosa Elena Dueñas, S.A de C. V. and glacial acetic acid and methanol were purchased to Fermont Chemicals Inc.
